comments.raw_text: Currently this is recorded per collection which is confusing and means that we don't see correct trigger amounts in the profiler.
comments.text: Currently this is recorded per collection which is confusing and means that we don't see correct trigger amounts in the profiler.

comments.creator: jcoppeard@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Currently we check heap thresholds after collecting the nursery but then clear majorGCTriggerReason if it was set. This leaves the trigger amounts set in the Statistics object.

Depends on D72383
comments.author: jcoppeard@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 9143080
Bug 1632775 - Don't attempt to trigger GC when collecting the nursery at the start of a major GC slice r?sfink


Currently we check heap thresholds after collecting the nursery but then clear majorGCTriggerReason if it was set. This leaves the trigger amounts set in the Statistics object.

Depends on D72383
